TopicTitle: Mod to remove the green text in the middle of the screen?

Articles.Content: I'm considering making some cinematics and such, possibly using BDArmory. As you may or may not know, BDA has a habit of using the green text that appears in the middle of the screen to indicate a lot of things. The issue is is that this text can't be turned off with the F2 key, which is... less than ideal for videos. So, is there a mod that removes all the text from the screen when the HUD is off?
